description:
When Seth and company return to Artemis Academy, they are enthusiastically welcomed as the heroes who exposed the misdeeds of an Inquisitor. But when Seth thinks about Hameline, and about his own blind rampage during the battle, he can`t find it in him to be pleased by the town`s accolades. Even when Majesty says he`s throwing a party for Seth, he can`t shake his sadness. Then, while Seth is alone and lost in his thoughts, Alma appears and shows him a letter from Taj in Rumble Town...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le monde que tu as changé
The World That You Changed: Relief
